faq.title: Discover more about our logic through this Frequently Asked Question
faq.subTitle: Find answers to common inquiries and dive deeper into the logic behind our services with this comprehensive FAQ section.

faqData.question: What is Overlogic
faqData.answer: Overlogic is a trusted software development agency that delivers solutions through deep thinking, innovation, and modern technology, and supports efficient, inclusive, and sustainable digital transformation.

faqData.question: What services does Overlogic provide?
faqData.answer: Overlogic offers web development, app development, UI/UX design, and software development partnership services tailored to meet your business needs.

faqData.question: How can I contact Overlogic for a project inquiry?
faqData.answer: You can place an order directly on our website using the available packages. If you have special requests, feel free to contact us at email@overlogicuniverse.com.

faqData.question: What industries does Overlogic serve?
faqData.answer: Overlogic serves various industries, including education, healthcare, retail, and more. Our solutions are customized to fit different business sectors.

faqData.question: Does Overlogic provide post-development support?
faqData.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive post-development support and maintenance to ensure your digital solutions perform seamlessly.

faqData.question: How long does it take for a project to be completed?
faqData.answer: Project timelines vary based on complexity and requirements. After an initial consultation, we provide an estimated timeline tailored to your project.

header.title: Building the Digital World, Embracing the Future
subTitle: Overlogic Universe was founded with a passion to bring revolutionary changes to the digital world. Since 2024, we have been helping individuals and companies turn their visions into reality through smart and innovative digital solutions.

Overlogic's mission is to be a trusted software development agency that provides solutions through deep, innovative, and modern technology-based thinking, and supports efficient, inclusive, and sustainable digital transformation.

visionMission.title: Overlogic Universe Helps Businesses Solve Many Problems

rafli.name: Muhammad Rafli Silehu
rafli.intro: As a Mobile Developer, I have experience in independent projects and relevant training using Kotlin Android, especially Flutter in project development. I am always passionate about creating mobile applications that provide a pleasant experience for users. I also have skills in web development and have founded a software development agency called Overlogic that can provide opportunities for members to gain experience in working on real projects.

ogya.name: Ogya Rajendra
ogya.intro: Hello, I'm Ogya Rajendra, a Web Developer & UI/UX Designer passionate about creating modern, functional, and user-centered digital experiences. I specialize in front-end development and intuitive interface design, ensuring websites are visually appealing, responsive, and easy to use.  With experience in news portals, e-learning platforms, and e-commerce websites, I combine technical expertise with design thinking to build engaging and high-performing web applications. I am always exploring new technologies and UI/UX trends to craft seamless and effective user experiences.
ogya.role: Front End, Designer, Social Media Specialist

chandra.name: Muhammad Chandra Aditya
chandra.intro:
Hello, I'm Chandra.
My journey into programming started at a young age. While most kids were playing games, I was fascinated by the idea of ‚Äã‚Äãhow the game work, from simply modifying game resources or modifying codes that I often play to get different experiences and just to see what different things would happen.  Little did I know, these small explorations would lead me into a passion for technology. As I grew, This curiosity eventually led me to pursue a degree in Informatics. I've learned various aspects of programming that I didn't know before, from web development that allows me to create interactive sites, to mobile application development that provides a complete user experience. ach journey in this field opened up new insights into how technology can be used to solve real-world problems and create innovative solutions that have impact in reality.  Of course, it was impossible to connect the dots looking forward when I was a kid. . However, it is very, very clear looking back a few years later. We may not always know where our steps will take us, but trust me‚Äîthe dots will connect in time. You have to trust in God and also your ability to believe‚Äîwhether it's in your instincts, destiny, life, or karma. This approach has never let me down, and has made a big difference in my life. I learned that loving what we do is the greatest fuel to keep moving forward.
chandra.role: Mobile Developer, Front-End Web Developer, Cyber Security Enthusiast

joko.name: Joko Supriyanto
joko.intro:
Passionate Android and Web Developer with a strong foundation in database management, software development, and project management. Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Informatics at Muhammadiyah University of Surakarta, where I also contribute as a Laboratory Assistant, guiding students in programming, database systems, and operating systems.
As part of the Google Developer Student Clubs Core Team, I actively create and manage AI-focused events to enhance community knowledge. Driven to build innovative solutions and foster growth in the tech ecosystem.

rizky.name: Rizky Maulana Saputra
rizky.intro: Hello! I am an undergraduate student majoring in Informatics at Universitas Muhammadiyah Surakarta and working as a Front-End Developer at Overlogic. I have a strong interest in web development, particularly in front-end, as well as artificial intelligence and machine learning. Currently, I am also working on several projects involving Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality technologies. With this experience, I hope to continue growing and making a positive impact in the tech industry

gilang.name: Gilang Sri Nayaka
gilang.intro: I am a student of Informatics Engineering at Universitas Muhammadiyah Surakarta. I have a deep interest in UI/UX Design and Front-End Development, and I always strive to learn and grow through various projects. Currently, I have completed the Bangkit 2024 Batch 2 program on the Mobile Development track.  I use Figma as my main tool for UI/UX design and am currently deepening my skills in Adobe XD and Adobe Illustrator. With a focus on user experience, I strive to create applications that are intuitive, engaging, and have a positive impact. I believe that good design is not only about aesthetics, but also about functionality and user convenience.

afrizal.name: Afrizal Putra Pratama
afrizal.intro: Hey, I'm Afrizal Putra Pratama! I'm an IT student at UMS, and I'm super passionate about UI Design. I'm currently learning and experimenting with cool user interface designs. I'm stoked to meet fellow design enthusiasts, share ideas, and learn from each other. Looking forward to connecting and creating something amazing together!

umsiid.title: UMS IID
umsiid.description: UMS International Innovation Day is an innovation competition and exhibition at Universitas Muhammadiyah Surakarta that took place over 5 days. The event encouraged the creative ideas of national and international students with the theme of SDG 3, and included an opening ceremony, exhibition, presentation, judging, innovation talk, and awarding. The event involves academics, students, and communities to create sustainable solutions and strengthen UMS' role at the international level.

pinleaf.title: Pinleaf
pinleaf.description: Pineleafcare is the pioneer of shoe, bag and stroller care solutions in Indonesia, Pineleafcare Franchise! The best solution for shoe, bag and stroller care business with training support and professional partnership system.

anugerah.title: Anugerah Powder Coating Blora
anugerah.description: Premium Powder Coating services not only enhance the beauty of metal surfaces, but also provide strong protection from pollution, fine scratches, and oxidation. Experience the perfect combination of durability and shine with our durable coatings, ensuring maximum protection for the long term.

josumaru.title: Josumaru
josumaru.description: A web portfolio created by one of Overlogic Universe's developers that was created by combining Next.JS, TypeScript, React, Tailwind CSS, and Aceternity UI.

vido.title: VIDO - Virtual Doctor
vido.description: Modern Healthcare Solutions Considerate and cute Assistant Best of the best. Now you can consult anywhere and everywhere with a cute and caring assitant, with us of course.

sheesh.title: SHEESH
sheesh.description: SHEESH is an intelligent hybrid market analysis mobile app designed to empower MSMEs with advanced tools for customer segmentation, trend analysis, and sales prediction. Powered by machine learning frameworks like Scikit-learn and TensorFlow, the app delivers data-driven insights to help businesses make informed decisions. Built with Flutter for a seamless user experience and Firebase for a secure and scalable backend, SHEESH provides comprehensive market analysis and customized heuristic guidance to drive growth and efficiency for small and medium enterprises.

parky.title: Parky
parky.description: Parky is an Android mobile application designed to streamline student parking management by using a QR Code scanning system to record entry and exit times. Built with Java for Android and integrated with Firebase, Parky ensures efficient data handling and real-time updates. The app includes key features such as a QR Code Scanner for automated check-ins and check-outs, User Authentication for secure access, and CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionalities to manage user data. Developed as a final project for a mobile development course, Parky enhances parking efficiency and security through modern mobile technology.

fospresence.title: Fospresence
fospresence.description: Fospresence is a mobile application designed to streamline attendance tracking for participants in FOSTI UMS work programs using a QR Code scanning system. Developed with Flutter and powered by Firebase, the app ensures efficient and secure attendance recording. Key features include a QR Code Scanner for quick check-ins, an Excel Exporter for generating attendance reports, and CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionalities for managing user data. By leveraging modern mobile technology, Fospresence simplifies attendance management, improves data accuracy, and enhances the overall efficiency of organizational events.

fostifest.title: FOSTIFEST 2024 WEB
fostifest.description: FOSTIFEST 2024 is a web-based platform designed to facilitate participant registration for workshops and competitions at FOSTIFEST 2024. Built with Next.js and powered by Supabase, the platform provides a seamless user experience with features including a dynamic landing page, secure authentication, and an intuitive registration system for competition participants. Users can upload payment proof via image files and submit competition entries through Google Drive links, ensuring a smooth and efficient registration process. By leveraging modern web technologies, FOSTIFEST 2024 enhances accessibility and streamlines event management for participants and organizers alike.

nusaira.title: NusAIra
nusaira.description:
NusAIra is an AI-based platform designed to assist farmers in monitoring and managing pond conditions. NusAIra's main objectives are to improve operational efficiency, reduce the risk of harvest failure, and provide data-driven recommendations for catfish farming optimization. NusAIra also has AI technology to predict catfish market prices and a chatbot service, as well as an e-book library aimed at helping beginner catfish farmers.
Technology used
Node.js + Express.js
Clever Cloud
Python (TensorFlow / Scikit-learn)
Pandas & NumPy
React + Next.js
Dialogflow / Rasa
Node.js
Key Features
‚úÖ Market Price Prediction
‚úÖ Interactive Chatbot
‚úÖ E-Book Library 
‚úÖ User Management
Purpose & Benefits
üìå Improve the efficiency of aquaculture with data-driven monitoring.
üìå Support the sustainability of the fisheries industry through digital technology innovation.
üìå Help beginner catfish farmers gain more knowledge through relevant e-books.
üìå Provide market price predictions that help farmers in planning product selling prices.
üìå Simplify communication with a chatbot that provides direct information about markets and products.
